title: how to test ping
body: how to test ping in the old and new client

replies.body:
Hey there,

The most reliable way to get an accurate approximation of your ping in-game would be to start up a custom game to take a look, however if you do not wish to start a custom game you can utilize the tool I've posted [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/Qgqm11ad-i-made-an-open-source-ping-testing-tool-for-oce-other-regions).
i remember i read some thing in the new clint can't test you ping
